allow: Bash(wsl -e bash -c "sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y zip")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix extraction of spend_era_name rollup property from Notion

The spend_era_name field is a rollup column in Notion, not a select
property. Rollup properties have a different structure than select:
- Select property: { select: { name: value } }
- Rollup property: { rollup: { type: "array", array: [...] } }

Added getRollup\(\) helper to handle rollup properties and updated
extractPageData to use it for spend_era_name and spend_name fields.

Fixes #22

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
